text:
Summary:
- Updated the light-mode theme tokens in `src/styles/globals.css` so the background, card, popover, and sidebar surfaces all share the required bright red (`oklch(0.63 0.26 29.23)`) hue, keeping light-mode surfaces aligned with the brand color.

Tests:
- `npm run check` *(fails: missing dependency `@t3-oss/env-nextjs` required by `src/env.js`)*

Blockers:
- Automated checks cannot complete until the `@t3-oss/env-nextjs` package is installed or otherwise restored to satisfy `src/env.js`.
